text: The terms Afghan War or War in Afghanistan may mean: *Islamic conquest of Afghanistan (637-709) *Anglo-Afghan Wars: ** First Anglo-Afghan War (1839-1842) **Second Anglo-Afghan War (1878-1881) ** Third Anglo-Afghan War (1919) * Panjdeh Incident (1885) * Reforms of Amanullah Khan and civil war (1928–1929) *Afghan Civil War (1978-present): ** Soviet war in Afghanistan (1979-1989) – Soviet involvement **Afghan Civil War (1989–1992) – Government collapse **Afghan Civil War (1992–1996) – Anarchy **Afghan Civil War (1996-2001) – Taliban period **War in Afghanistan (2001–2021) – NATO involvement
title: Afghanistan War
